CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 17, 1953, pg. 4, reads: "New Site For Holy Cross Episcopal Church - The new home of the Church of the Holy Cross is located at the corner of Collier and Kelly Streets in the Homewood district.  The new facilities include an auditorium which seats 500, a large rectory, and a parish hall with dining facilities, meeting rooms, a church school on a large tract of land which lends itself to effective landscaping. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: St. James Memorial Episcopal Church (later Holy Cross Church), 7509 Kelly Street at Collier Street, Homewood
